Cosmetics_Survey.question: Which age range do you fall into?
Cosmetics_Survey.description: Depending on your age, you may have specific concerns that might be relevant.

Cosmetics_Survey.question: Where do you call home?
Cosmetics_Survey.description: Different climates and environments call for different approaches to skincare.

Cosmetics_Survey.question: How much time do you usually spend in the sun?
options: Very little: Less than 3 hours per week
A lot: 48 hours or more per week

Cosmetics_Survey.question: What type of routine would you like?
Cosmetics_Survey.description: We want to take into account your lifestyle and preferences.
options: Just looking for a few product recommendation not a routine!

Cosmetics_Survey.question: How much time do you set aside to take care of your skin before bed?
Cosmetics_Survey.description: Different climates and environments call for different approaches to skincare.
options: Less than a minute - to wash and dry my face
A few minutes - to throughly wash my face, dab on a spot treatment or eye cream and moisturize
Five minutes or so - I typically wash my face, exfoliate or wash-off mask occasionally, apply a serum and moisturize.

Cosmetics_Survey.question: How do you wash your face?
options: Warm water + an oil based cleanser

options: Less than a minute - to wash and dry my face

Cosmetics_Survey.question: Which skin care products are you most interested in adding to your routine?
Cosmetics_Survey.description: Certain ingredients help to address specific skin needs. Pick your favorite!
options: Ones that have acid in them
Ones that stimulate collagen production and reduce wrinkles
Ones that protect and repair skin
Ones that are nourishing and hydrating

Cosmetics_Survey.question: How reactive would you consider your skin?
options: Hardly reactive at all, I can use all products
Somewhere in the middle, it depends on the ingredients
Very reactive/ sensitive, I frequently experience redness

Cosmetics_Survey.question: Which of the following best describes your skin?
Cosmetics_Survey.description: Though everyone's skin produces oil, sometimes it's more apparent or obvious in some skin types than others.
options: Rarely gets oily; feels and looks dry
Not too oily or too dry; overall feels balanced
Some oilness on my forehead and cheeks; tends to be more noticeable at the end of the day
Very oily; has a shiny apperance throughout the day

Cosmetics_Survey.question: When I wake up in the morning, my skin feels ________
options: Just fine! Nothing out of the ordinary

Cosmetics_Survey.question: How frequently do you get acne or breakouts?
options: Very frequently, and it's difficult to manage
